text: Carlos Vagner Gularte Filho (born 29 October 1990), known as Ferrão, is a Brazilian futsal player who plays for Barcelona and the Brazilian national futsal team as a pivot. ==Honours== *UEFA Futsal Champions League third place: 2018–19 *Melhor jogador do mundo em: 2019 ==References== ==External links== *Liga Nacional Fútbol Sala profile Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian men's futsal players
title: Ferrão
